statements: SELECT * FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT pest_name, disease_name FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records WHERE occurrence_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, pest_name, occurrence_date FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records WHERE disease_name LIKE '%Powdery Mildew%';
SELECT * FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC, record_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records WHERE field_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records WHERE pest_name = 'Aphids';
SELECT field_id, pest_name, disease_name FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records WHERE field_id = 101 ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC;
SELECT pest_name, COUNT(*) AS occurrence_count FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records GROUP BY pest_name;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), occurrence_date)) AS average_days_since_occurrence FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records WHERE pest_name = 'Mites';
SELECT * FROM Pest_and_Disease_Records WHERE occurrence_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM pest_occurrences;
SELECT pest_name, occurrence_date FROM pest_occurrences ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, location FROM disease_occurrences WHERE occurrence_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pest_name, location FROM pest_occurrences WHERE location = 'Garden' ORDER BY pest_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_occurrences FROM pest_occurrences;
SELECT * FROM pest_occurrences ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC, pest_name ASC
SELECT pest_name, occurrence_date FROM pest_occurrences WHERE location = 'Garden'
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM pest_occurrences
SELECT * FROM disease_occurrences WHERE disease_name = 'Malaria' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT pest_name, location FROM pest_occurrences WHERE occurrence_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM pest_occurrences ORDER BY occurrence_date DESC;
SELECT id, pest_name FROM pest_occurrences WHERE agricultural_field_id = 2;
SELECT disease_name, occurrence_date FROM disease_occurrences WHERE occurrence_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_name, acreage FROM agricultural_fields WHERE field_location = 'California' ORDER BY acreage DESC;
SELECT * FROM pest_occurrences WHERE pest_name = 'aphids';
SELECT pest_name, occurrence_date FROM pest_occurrences WHERE agricultural_field_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM disease_occurrences WHERE occurrence_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_name, acreage FROM agricultural_fields WHERE acreage > 50 AND field_location = 'California';
SELECT pest_name, COUNT(*) FROM pest_occurrences GROUP BY pest_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT a.field_name, b.disease_name FROM agricultural_fields a JOIN disease_occurrences b ON a.id = b.agricultural_field_id;
SELECT * FROM pests
SELECT name, type FROM diseases
SELECT id, location, area FROM fields ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, type, date_occurred FROM diseases JOIN occurrences ON diseases.id = occurrences.disease_id
SELECT * FROM occurrences WHERE field_id = 3
SELECT * FROM pests;
SELECT name, type FROM diseases WHERE type='Fungal';

SELECT pests.name, diseases.name, fields.location FROM occurrences INNER JOIN pests ON occurrences.pest_id = pests.id INNER JOIN diseases ON occurrences.disease_id = diseases.id INNER JOIN fields ON occurrences.field_id = fields.id;
SELECT fields.location, COUNT(*) AS occurrences_count FROM occurrences INNER JOIN fields ON occurrences.field_id = fields.id GROUP BY fields.location;
SELECT DISTINCT pests.type FROM pests;
SELECT * FROM Pest;
SELECT name, type FROM Pest WHERE type = 'Insect';
SELECT field_name, location FROM Field WHERE owner_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT name, symptoms FROM Disease ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOccurrence WHERE occurrence_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Pest WHERE type = 'Insect';
SELECT name, affected_crops FROM Pest WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT Disease.name, Field.location FROM Disease JOIN DiseaseOccurrence ON Disease.id = DiseaseOccurrence.disease_id JOIN Field ON DiseaseOccurrence.field_id = Field.id WHERE Disease.treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT Field.owner_name FROM Field LEFT JOIN DiseaseOccurrence ON Field.id = DiseaseOccurrence.field_id WHERE DiseaseOccurrence.occurrence_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Pest.name, Field.field_name, DiseaseOccurrence.occurrence_date FROM Pest JOIN PestOccurrence ON Pest.id = PestOccurrence.pest_id JOIN Field ON PestOccurrence.field_id = Field.id JOIN DiseaseOccurrence ON Field.id = DiseaseOccurrence.field_id WHERE DiseaseOccurrence.disease_id = 1 AND Pest.type = 'Weed';
